channel.title: How do u make npc / shops talk?
channel.description: like say i placed a npc at home how would i make it so it said welcome to "my serve" or w.e new to codeing srry if its super easy just cant find anythign on it

item.source: How do u make npc / shops talk?

item.title: How do u make npc / shops talk?
item.dc:creator: @Efilite Efilite
item.description:
@Efilite wrote:

Easiest way is to go in npchandler.java and look for moo.
You will see the following piece of code.

if (npcs[i].npcType == 81) { if (misc.random2(50) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Moo"; } }
Copy that code, you need to first edit a few things.

if (npcs[i].npcType == ID OF THE NPC) { if (misc.random2(50) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "HERE TYPE WHAT THE NPC WILL SAY"; } }

Read full topic

item.title: How do u make npc / shops talk?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Go to your NPCHandler class and find this -

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPC ID && misc.random2(15) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "MESSAGE"; }
Just edit the NPC ID and the message.

Read full topic
item.source: How do u make npc / shops talk?

umm look in npchandler.java and find an npc that already shouts things out and copy that but change the npc id and message
